DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator investigate change hemodynamic parameter cerebral oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) associate 10 cmH2O PEEP , assume beneficial respiratory function oxygenation laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( LC ) apply 30Â°head-up left side position , compare use two individual device ( INVOS-FORESIGHT ) . Methods : Afterwards ethic committee approval hospital receive write patient ' consent , patient undergo ASA I-II group elective laparoscopic surgery randomly divide two group . Sensors INVOS FORESIGHT device place right side forehead region . Totally 11 evaluation period form , respectively : Pre-induction ( 1st Period ) , post-induction ( 2nd period ) , abdominal insufflation outset ( 3rd period ) : post-insufflation 5-minute interval ( 4th , 5th , 6th , 7th 8th period ) , end insufflation ( 9th period ) , end operation ( 10th period ) end anaesthesia ( 11th period ) . While one group applied PEEP ( ZEEP ) , group apply 10 cmH2O simultaneously abdominal insufflation proceeding . Demographic data , hemodynamic value rSO2 value record group 11 period .
DOC.brief_title: 10cmH2O Peep Application Cerebral Oxygenation Laparoscopic Surgery : Comparative Study With Invos Foresight Devices
DOC.criteria: ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologist ) class I II Patients undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy ASA class III IV Morbid obesity Emergency case Cases return laparotomy
